thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 131 of 7354
thread.title: Lester

author: Lester
title: Lester
text:
In the past year, this will be my 15th purchase from BandH, buying over 20 items, for either myself or as gifts. Their prices are competitive and when you factor in free shipping, no tax, and with me living Maryland, receiving my purchases as fast as one but never longer than three days, they simply can't be beat. The website is a breeze to navigate but sometimes lacks informative product description; however, this is only a slight irritation as I usually know exactly what I want to buy.
I HAVE AND WILL CONTINUE TO RECOMMEND THIS COMPANY TO ANYONE.
P.S.
The mobile app? It can be described in three words; fun, fun, fun!
